title: Eat Run Love
overview: Campus golden boy Gan Yang fell for the always-on-the-go Ding Zhitong at first sight. Burdened by debt, Ding Zhitong never had time for romance until she was captivated by the cheerful Gan Yang. Despite their different backgrounds, their undeniable chemistry convinced her to give love a chance. But their financial chasm and adulthood realities cast shadows over their sweet romance. Later when Gan Yang's family empire crumbled, he hid the truth and broke up with Ding Zhitong. Believing herself betrayed, the devastated Ding Zhitong grows to resent him after sudden life upheavals. Six years later, they're face-to-face in the business
